fields.name: ConnectionId
fields.description: Unique identification of ITSM connection among multiple defined in above workspace.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the Itsm receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within an action group.

fields.name: Region
fields.description: Region in which workspace resides. Supported values:'centralindia','japaneast','southeastasia','australiasoutheast','uksouth','westcentralus','canadacentral','eastus','westeurope'

fields.name: TicketConfiguration
fields.description: JSON blob for the configurations of the ITSM action. CreateMultipleWorkItems option will be part of this blob as well.
